content: {"name": "Masbia of Boro Park", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For food pantry be sure to make appointment every time you come to pick up pantry items, TEXT ( FOOD) TO 726879\nFor food pantry appointment via Plentyfull please select location ( Masbia BP) for this address .", "email": "", "url": "http://www.masbiaboropark.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5402 New Utrecht Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Borough Park", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11219", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6323632, "longitude": -73.9955253}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 972-4446", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "May be closed during Jewish holidays"}]}
